method: **Pale & Flickering Wisps:** Grind these quickly south of Draynor or Falador.
**Bright Wisps:** Located east of the Digsite / Varrock.
tips: Consider doing **Guthixian Caches** daily from here on out.
Unlock the **Divination Outfit** pieces if doing Caches.

method: **Sparkling Wisps:** Golden Apple tree area (Rellekka) or near Tower of Life.
tips: Make sure to bring urns if you can craft/buy them.

method: **Vibrant Wisps:** Mobilising Armies area (south of Feldip Hills).
tips: You are approaching the Hall of Memories unlock.

method: **Hall of Memories:** Located under the Memorial to Guthix. This is usually faster than Lustrous Wisps.
tips: Join a 'CoreHunting' FC to make this extremely fast.

method: **Hall of Memories / Radiant Wisps:** HoM is still best XP. Radiant (85) in Dragontrap is decent AFK.
tips: Use the **Divine Conversion** relic (Arch 98) if you have it for AFK.

method: **Incandescent Wisps:** South of Tyras Camp. Best energy money making.
tips: Use the **Elder Divination Outfit** and **Divine Conversion** relic to instantly convert entire inventory.

method: **Guthixian Cache:** Enter every hour on the hour. Get 200 points daily.
tips: Prioritize depositing Memories of Guthix or subduing automatons as Cres.
